page.title: 09 Occupations - Boars Hill
page.content: The only industry of note in the Boars Hill area is farming, the landscape reflects this.In Bayworth however there is a small automobile workshop where repairs are carried out. There are also two small landscape gardening businesses which give employment to 6 people. Many people in the Boars Hill area are retired business people or people connected with Oxford Colleges. Many people in Bayworth are employed at the Austin Rover car factory in Cowley or in distributing trades in Oxford and Abingdon. Unemployment is comparitively low in the area.
